title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. L, pt. 170 - Financial Accounting In School Districts
content:

§ 170.1 - Common school districts
§ 170.2 - Union free school districts

§ 170.5 - Advances to certain school districts and cities
§ 170.6 - Flexible payments
§ 170.7 - Lease-purchase of instructional equipment
§ 170.8 - Common, union-free, central and small city school district budgets

§ 170.11 - School property tax report card
§ 170.12 - School district financial accountability

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. L, pt. 170

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§ 101, 207, 211-d[1]
-[9], 215, 305[1], [2], [26], 309, 1608, 1716, 1950, 1951, 2576[5-b], 2601-a as
amd. by § 15 of ch. 171, L. 1996, 3609[1][b][6]; L. 1996, ch. 474, §§ 14, 16, 21, 108, 111, 112, 115; L. 1997, ch. 436, § 1, part A, §§ 5, 7, 14; L. 1999, ch. 405, part L, §§ 10-a, 10-b; L. 2007, ch. 57, parts A, B; L. 2008, chs. 57, 58, part A
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
